summary: This is a domestic witness travel request form from the SDNY Victim/Witness Unit, dated November 19, 2021, for a fact witness who is also a victim-witness in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The witness is needed for trial and trial preparation, requiring hotel accommodation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which is the subject of the witness travel request.

persons.name: Ed Tyrrell
persons.context: Mentioned in the instructions as a contact for questions regarding witness travel funding for investigative interviews, as opposed to grand jury or court testimony.

events.title: Witness Travel Request Submission
events.description: A domestic witness travel request form is completed for a victim-witness to travel to the SDNY for the trial and preparation in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is a formal travel request for a fact witness who is also identified as a victim-witness in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The witness is needed for trial and trial preparation, indicating the Maxwell trial was active or in preparation as of November 2021.
The witness is not a government employee, not facing criminal charges, and resides within the continental United States.
The form references specific DOJ instructions (1300.01.01) and procedures for funding witness travel, highlighting the bureaucratic process involved.
